channel.title: How to setup redash in my local machine?
channel.description:
hi team, I have downloaded the redash app in my local machine, installed all dependency packages. When I run the application using "python manage.py runserver" i got an form for reference : refer this image. ![redash1|690x393](upload://35xMKwfZZkgL7uQ55xB8Z4mRZMa.png) after submitting the form it is redirecting to the same page. i'm not getting any errors. (object is created in database)
Please tell me how to setup and run the application.

item.title: How to setup redash in my local machine?
item.dc:creator: ajgreen
item.description:
EgorKraev:

docker-compose.yml and redash.env

where are you able to get the docker-compose.yml and redash.env and if you can share via GitHub. txs- I got it. its at setup/data at master · getredash/setup · GitHub

Read full topic

item.title: How to setup redash in my local machine?
item.dc:creator: kishan.donepudi
item.description:
May be documentation should be more elaborative for beginners

Have achieved it by using the following article

Medium – 28 Jul 19

Setup self-hosted Redash in windows

Looking for building a dashboard with historical analytics graphs without spending time on searching for a paid BI tool and time-series…

Reading time: 3 min read

item.title: How to setup redash in my local machine?
item.dc:creator: meghana
item.description:
Thank u. I already installed docker in my local machine referring this link : https://redash.io/help-onpremise/dev/docker.html.
but didn’t run the application using docker, bcoz of lack of information i’m little confused(and also new to flask). BTW thanks for sharing.

Read full topic
item.source: How to setup redash in my local machine?

item.title: How to setup redash in my local machine?
item.dc:creator: tonyjiangh
item.description:
If you want production environment, see docker compose here
https://redash.io/help-onpremise/setup/setting-up-redash-instance.html

for development environment:
docker: https://redash.io/help-onpremise/dev/docker.html
build yourself: https://redash.io/help-onpremise/dev/setup.html

And since you’re asking this question, I would assume that you haven’t check any document provided at the repository. I do suggest you look around there because we have a lot of useful information.

GitHub

getredash/redash

Make Your Company Data Driven. Connect to any data source, easily visualize, dashboard and share your data. - getredash/redash

Read full topic
